sentences.en: A sparkle of merriment or delight in the eye.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛兴奋得闪闪发光.

sentences.en: He saw the joke quickly and joined in the general merriment.
sentences.cn: 他很快就领悟到了其中的幽默,于是和大家一起欢笑起来.

sentences.en: Her escapades were a subject of merriment in the sorority house.
sentences.cn: 在女生联谊会中,她的恶作剧总是欢乐的根源.
她的眼里闪现出愉快的神情。

sentences.en: His strange new hairstyle was the cause of much merriment.
sentences.cn: 他那新奇的发式成为笑柄.

sentences.en: Ideal, can give world the unfortunate with the merriment!
sentences.cn: 理想, 能给天下不幸者以欢乐!

sentences.en: Merriment is not a bad or degrading quality.
sentences.cn: 笑笑闹闹不是什么坏的或者卑鄙的品德.

sentences.en: Music, dancing, drinking, love and general merriment are more than simple pastimes.
sentences.cn: 对音乐 、 舞蹈 、 美酒 、 爱情还有各种各样的游戏的追求远远超越了普通消遣的水平.

sentences.en: She found fresh sources of merriment.
sentences.cn: 这给她提供了不少新的笑料.

sentences.en: The cheerless monotony was sometimes enlivened with a little innocent merriment.
sentences.cn: 有时候,一点儿天真的嬉戏会使阴郁单调的生活增添一点生气.

sentences.en: They immediately joined in the merriment as if they knew what was going on.
sentences.cn: 似乎很知道大家为什么笑,这两位也凑在数内微笑.

sentences.en: This extraordinary assertion was greeted with a roar of merriment.
sentences.cn: 这个奇怪的论断引起了欢声大笑.

sentences.en: We celebrated the New Year with merriment.
sentences.cn: 我们欢天喜地地庆祝新年.
玩得这般兴高彩烈,有什么要庆祝 吗 ?

sentences.en: Wine gives not light hilarity, but noisy merriment.
sentences.cn: 酒不给人以轻松的欢乐, 而给人以嚣嚷的狂欢.

words.tran_cn: 愉快的；微醉的；嬉戏作乐的
愉快的，高兴的；令人欢乐的
愉快地；热闹地；喜气洋洋地
